rescuecore2.standard.components

Class StandardSimulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • rescuecore2.components.AbstractComponent<T>
      • rescuecore2.components.AbstractSimulator<StandardWorldModel>
        • rescuecore2.standard.components.StandardSimulator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component, Simulator
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClearSimulator, CollapseSimulator, FireSimulatorWrapper, IgnitionSimulator, MiscSimulator, TrafficSimulator

    public abstract class StandardSimulator
extends AbstractSimulator<StandardWorldModel>
    Abstract base class for standard simulators.
